Name: Alek (1-5)
Tactics:
• If Alek is within 1 tile of a Hero, he moves adjacent to the Hero.
• If Alek is adjacent to a Monster, he attacks with a fist.
• Otherwise, Alek moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.
Extra: Alek counts as a Hero for the purpose of Monster tactics.

Name: Brandis (6-8)
Tactics:
• If Brandis is within 1 tile of a Hero, he moves adjacent to the Hero.
• If Brandis is on a tile with an unexplored edge, draw a tile from the bottom of the stack and place a Monster on that tile.
• Otherwise, Brandis moves 1 tile toward the closest tile with an unexplored edge.
Extra: Brandis counts as a Hero for the purpose of Monster tactics.

Name: Cassi (9-12)
Tactics:
• If Cassi is within 1 tile of a Hero, she moves adjacent to the closest Hero.
• Otherwise, Cassi moves 1 tile toward the closest Exit or Start tile.
Extra: Cassi counts as a Hero for the purpose of Monster tactics.

Name: Donnel (13-16)
Tactics:
• If Donnel is within 1 tile of a Monster, he moves adjacent to the closest Monster and attacks with a wild punch.
• Otherwise, Donnel moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.
Extra: Donnel counts as a Hero for the purpose of Monster tactics.

Name: Elizar (17-20)
Tactics:
• If Elizar is within 1 tile of a Monster, she cowers in fear and does nothing.
• Otherwise, Elizar moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.
Extra: Elizar counts as a Hero for the purpose of Monster tactics.
